article_title: Dow Plunges 276 Points in First Trading Day of 2016
article_text:
Global stocks kicked off 2016 with a stumble, as a disappointing report on China’s economy rekindled concerns over slowing global growth and tempered hopes for a better year.

U.S. stocked tumbled at the open and remained lower throughout the session on the heels of a rout in European and Asian markets. The Dow Jones Industrial Average fell as...
